Text: WTF is this?
It's from the guys who made dwarwnia (or whaterver). It resembles the movie war games alot.
I just downloaded it and got bored after 2-3 matches or so. Also, can anyone play multiplayer?
It does not work for me for some reason.
no MP in this release.
Just buy the game, ?14 isn't all that much, and it's a blast to play multiplayer =D.
?14 is supposed to be 14 Euros.
try download hamachi vpn to use the mp version of this game on ya own private "lan" with ya friends.. great mp-gae..

This game is pretty cool, and you don't need Hamachi to play it, only thing that doesn't seem to work is the server list, just go to SEARCH and select Direct IP and enter your friends IP, played with 4 people today, great fun!

Cool game, like Darwinia it has a very special style. The developers actually had War games in mind when they made this game (quite obvious but any way)

The movie is quite good, It's about a guy who at the time had all the best computer stuff from the time when the movie was made.

Because it's a bit old, the film get an amusing retro feeling. And the acting isn't bad.

The main character is a young Matthew Broderick.
what the fuck ar u talking about? shit is a game, and I do not know what darwinia is... However, its quite a cool game with a nice idea but u get bored of it pretty fast..

its very obviously a niche game. go to gamespot and look at  the screenshots - if you arent interested then dont download, and dont bitch.

but unless you are content with every single game on the market being the traditional warcraft, half-life and diablo II clones with simply updated graphics then STFU. its a good thing when developers think out of the box, it gives us gamers a lot more to choose from rather than rehashing the same tired old thing over and over again.

that said, this is not my style of game.. but i am glad its out there.

I've always been a fan or Introverse games.
I'll propably buy this one from steam.



Uplink and Darwinia were the previous games, btw.
In Uplink, you played as a hacker. In darwinia, you had to lead some thinking pixel-guys out of a virtual world gone bad, with viruses.

DEFCON is made by Introversion Software, a game developer based in Great Britain.  For more info on DEFCON go to:

http://www.introversion.co.uk/defcon/
